summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 772, for the improvement of Kilbourne Street, and West Kilbourne Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to Linden Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers therein, under Ordinance No. 9660 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
